synopsis.text: Azure, the second prince of Fortna, stumbles upon Nina, a resilient orphan with striking lapis lazuli eyes, the same color as the God of the Stars and the late Princess Alisha. In a twist of fate, Azure commands Nina to assume the role of the deceased princess and Priestess of the Stars, destining her to become the false bride of Sett, the first prince of the neighboring nation of Galgada. Despite her newfound purpose, Nina struggles to leave her past behind and questions the intentions of Azure, all while grappling with the burgeoning feelings in her heart, knowing she is promised to another. As the destinies of all involved begin to unfold, they must determine the lengths they will go to protect those they hold dear.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
